title: Direct chemoselective reduction of plant oils using silane catalysed by Rh(III) complexes at ambient temperature
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SU00481C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Unai Prieto-Pascual, Itxaso Bustos, Zoraida Freixa, Amit Kumar, Miguel A. Huertos
This work reports a new procedure for the selective reduction of plant oils to fatty alcohols. This methodology is performed under mild reaction conditions and in the absence of solvents.
